original_title: แตก 4 รัก โลภ โกรธ เลว
overview: 4 young friends are very close and happy. One of them is training to be a cop and one of the others gets involved in the underworld. His life of crime soon causes repercussions for his friends, and their friendship is put to the test. Will it in fact break down, or will their friendship become stronger?
title: Friendship Breakdown
